title: 이달의소녀탐구 #502 (LOONA TV #502)
summary:
0:01 -- Chuu is enjoying with the wind and the curtains behind her. "Hi-Mart Model".
0:13 -- HeeJin focuses the camera on HyunJin who seems to be dreaming or sleeping. "Imagining about eating breads"
0:20 -- She notices the camera and faintly smiles. "I was just sleeping... AEONG~"
0:31 -- ViVi mentions that the white floor got dirty when the danced and the staffers are working hard to clean it again and how she is thankful.
(Hats of to the staffers who make everything work in the end. They deserve a lot of credit!👏👏👏)
0:45 -- Yves and Go Won talk about how serious everyone is and then there is YeoJin who is messing around. Our froggo jumps to the conclusion that Go Won called her short.
